1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"A baby boy was brought to the Prophet who then urinated on him. He sprinkled over it with water and did not wash it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي بَوْلِ الصَّبِيِّ الَّذِي لَمْ يَطْعَمْ
chapter.eng-name: Concerning the urine of an infant boy who is not yet eating solid food
